about_the_game:
Welcome to a good ol' game of dice!

Diecast is a roguelike based on the classic dice game "yacht dice". Roll crazy combinations of dice to reach increasingly outrageous scores. Roll and reroll your dice to make a scoring hand to win each round. Use the money you win to buy new dice with unique abilities and faces, increasing your options. Or, buy new scoring hands and powerful items that can change your strategy in drastic ways. But with each completed round the score needed to win increases, and the stakes are raised.

Challenge yourself in boss rounds that have unique quirks that can change your approach. Find new combinations of dice, scoring hands, and items during each run to help you roll your way to victory or beyond! Unlock and try out different sets of starting dice that provide further challenges and strategies to what you can do.

  • Over 64 dice with special abilities, variations, and classes

  • Over two-dozen upgradable hands with unique rules for scoring

  • Over 40 items to add further possibilities to your run

  • Endless possibility for strategy and fun, designed around 30+ minute runs

Again, welcome to a good ol' game of dice! I hope you enjoy the show!
